resources.string:
Hi. Welcome to my App! 
 My name is Zack and I love to learn new technologies. 
 Right now I am learning Android and the Kotlin programming language. 
 I will be learning this language for at-least the next six weeks. Hopefully, though I will be getting a new job and earning my degree and then my masters.
I have worked with Swift, some Java and I have touched on Javascript and Node.js. Although, I prefer mobile and backend development over web and front end. I will always pick mobile and backend dev over anything else.

I have worked with docker and containers. I use Jira and I work in Scrum and
 with agile methodologies. I would like to continue my learning, and learn more about algorithms and how we can use them to influence the world in a better way.
